Vigilance
[i]Rallying Spear[/i] – When Lukas, Sharp Soldier enters, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain vigilance until end of turn.
[i]Call for Deliverance[/i] – When Lukas, Sharp Soldier enters, create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.
[i]Promote[/i] – At the end of combat on your turn, if you attacked a player with Lukas and two or more creatures, transform him.
